page.title: 08A Pupil's Day : Tuesday
page.content: In the morning Iwake at 7.45 a.m.I get up,wash and dress, make my bed & brush my hair.At 8.00a.m I have my breakfast and a cup of tea.I go upstairs when I have finished and brush my teeth.Iget my schooi bags ready and set off to school with my friend Hazel Duckels at 8.35a.m. I reach school at 8.40a.m. have ten minutes play and then go into the classroom to work.Mrs Forman does the register and afterwards we normally do maths for an hour or so until break. We go out for 20 minutes Sometimes we have English after break.At 12.00 I go home for dinner.At 1.10 we have craft or drama and break at 2.15. We have games until 3.30. When I get home I have a drink and go swimming with my mother and brother from 5.00 to 6.00p.m. We have fish and chips and I play out until 9.00 bedtime.
